patterns: What is Depression?
What are the causes of depression?
What are the top causes of depression?
i am afraid i will fail again
I am good for nothing!
Does oversleeping cause depression?
no one loves me
I am alone.
responses: Depression is a mood disorder that causes a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest. Also called major depressive disorder or clinical depression, it affects how you feel, think and behave and can lead to a variety of emotional and physical problems.

It's complicated, and there are multiple causes of major depression. Factors such as genetic vulnerability, severe life stressors, substances you may take (some medications, drugs and alcohol) and medical conditions can affect the way your brain regulates your moods.
Abuse. Past physical, sexual, or emotional abuse can increase the vulnerability to clinical depression later in life.
failure is the stepping stone towards success.Never fear failure.Your hardwork and determination will help you reach your goal.

Your perception of how good you are, will never be accurate. If you wake up everyday in the morning, smile to yourself and tell yourself that the day is yours to seize you might stop feeling that way. Carpe Diem! my friend.
oversleeping can exacerbate and worsen depression symptoms
you don't need anyone to love you. You are awesome the way you are.
Dont feel alone try be friend with others.

responses: I have heard that 3 3 3 rule is the best method to reduce anxiety.In this method you have to mentally note three things you see, three sounds you hear, and then move three parts of your body. This exercise can help your mind refocus on something else. Give this method a try I am sure it will help you
Why were feeling anxious? Does something happens to you.

patterns: Can lack of sleep make you feel sad?
i sleep less nowadays
responses: Studies show people who are sleep deprived report increases in negative moods (anger, frustration, irritability, sadness) and decreases in positive moods.
